'hondata hitha gannawa ahana deta witharak uththara denawa.nikam pandithakam katha karala ugathkam pennanda gihin marumkanda epa-hondata hitha gannawa me inne koheda kiyala'karaththakaru ee kisiwak therune nathiwak men sitiyeya.ee mohothe ralahami wenath kisiyam karanayakata yannak men gos wisiwi gos thibu pana ahulagena nawathath thama asune haribari gasi wadiwiya.eelanga prashnaya kumak wiya yuthu dayi ohu mandak kalpana kaleya.mese prashna kara purudda adu nisath wenath sakakaruwangen men anupiliwelata asana prashnawalata kawuruth dena pilithuru nowima nisath ohu thula sulu thathiganmakda kopayakda hata ganemin thibina.eelanga prashnaya asimata ohu karaththakaruge muna desa baluweya.thama hisakewalin adimen awulwi giya karali wi giya digati hisake pimbi adi hayak pamana wu ohuge usa thawath wadiwimen penina.itha palal urahisda atharin pathara pasunu wadunu rawulada thama wethama ellawi thibunu thiyunu das da danahisa dakwa watunu hin digu dath da ralahami thula siyum bhithiyak athi kaleya.

me athara kolambaa jathika kauthukagaraya narambaimata niyamitha athara kolambaa pihiti brithanya kawunsilaya wethada yamata niyamithaya.me athara kamila pakar aadipadawariya kolambaa pihiti mahajana pusthakalaye sancharaya karamin lama pusthakalaye katayuthu nirikshanaya kirimata niyamitha athara hom start lanka satalayit madhyasthanaya nirikshanaya karamin wishesha lama wadasatahanakata sahabhagiwimata niyamithawa atha.eeta amatharawa aadipadawariya kolambaa rijwe aarya lama rohala wetha gos newasikawa prathikara labana lamunge suwaduk wimasimata niyamithaya.brithanyaye otunna himi chals kumaraya mita pera awastha dekakadi shri lankawata pamina thibena athara1998 wasaredi saha 2005 wasaredi melesa pamina thibe.
